Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts. 
3 other KABs impacted the outskirts/southern suburbs around 10 minutes ago.
Repeated launches were carried out by Su-34s at high altitudes.
Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts.   3 other KABs impacted the outskirts/southern suburbs around 10 minutes ago.  Repeated launches were carried out by Su-34s at high altitudes.

These new ones are 25 km away from the city, over Kamyanske. 
Even more launches were carried out.
Scenes from Zaporizhzhia City. A large attack is underway.
These new ones are 25 km away from the city, over Kamyanske.   Even more launches were carried out.

KABs are 5 km from Zaporizhzhia City.
More KABs are flying to the western suburbs.
Repeated launch maneuvers were carried out by Su-34s.
Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts again.

More from Zaporizhzhia. 
This is in the Pivdenny District in the southern part of the city.

The last group of KABs is flying over Plavni/Stepnohirsk, 20 km from Zaporizhzhia City.
Additionally, at least 8 Geran-2 drones are flying in a chain format in the direction of the city.
The last group of KABs is flying over Plavni/Stepnohirsk, 20 km from Zaporizhzhia City.  Additionally, at least 8 Geran-2 drones are flying in a chain format in the direction of the city.

3-4 more explosions, impacting the Kushuhum area, south of the city.
Currently all clear for glide-bombs
8-9 FAB-500s were used in total, launched by 4-5 Su-34s at their launch lines northwest of Tokmak, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.

Footage showing Ukrainian volunteers evacuating civilians from Kostyantynivka, Donetsk Oblast, under Russian FPV drone and artillery fire.
Video is from November 19, 2025
Credit
More from Zaporizhzhia.   This is in the Pivdenny District in the southern part of the city.

Two geolocations show that one of the Russian glide-bombs impacted a high-rise residential building in the Pivdenni District of Zaporizhzhia City.
Coordinates: 47.7748, 35.17731
Two geolocations show that one of the Russian glide-bombs impacted a high-rise residential building in the Pivdenni District of Zaporizhzhia City.  Coordinates: 47.7748, 35.17731

What's odd is that the damage here does not match that expected from a 250 or 500-kilogram bomb. 
Previously, I thought that it impacted right at the base or in front of the building (red square), but footage posted by the OVA shows that there is no crater. Only minor damage to the front of the building can be seen (yellow square).
It's possible that the glide-bomb was shot down over the southern suburbs of the city, although this is a very rare occurrence. 
At least 21 civilians were injured in the attack - no deaths have been reported yet.

Russian forces have captured the village of Svitle, Dobropillya direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~1,030.
Total land area: 0.80 km¬≤.
The fighting for Svitle lasted approximately 12 days.
KABs approaching Pivdenny District, Zaporizhzhia City.
Explosions in Zaporizhzhia

Near-exact movement of the KAB glide-bomb. 
It was launched by a Su-34 at medium-high altitude at its launch lines near Molochansk, Zaporizhzhia Oblast, and impacted the Pivdenny District of Zaporizhzhia City (same area as yesterday).
The Su-34 has flown back on a return course from Molochansk, flying east of Melitopol to the Sea of Azov.

- ‚ÄúThe Trump administration has announced a massive package of arms sales to Taiwan valued at more than $10 billion that includes medium-range missiles, howitzers and drones‚Ä¶
The eight arms sales agreements announced Wednesday cover 82 high-mobility artillery rocket systems, or HIMARS, and 420 Army Tactical Missile Systems, or ATACMS‚Ä¶
Other sales in the package include military software valued at more than $1 billion, Javelin and TOW missiles worth more than $700 million, helicopter spare parts worth $96 million and refurbishment kits for Harpoon missiles worth $91 million.‚Äù - AP.

Following the fall of Siversk and recent Russian advances near Lyman, the Donetsk OVA announced mandatory evacuation orders for families with children in the cities of Mykolaivka and Svyatohirsk, along with 28 other settlements. 
As a result, Slovyansk is the only city in Ukrainian-controlled Donetsk Oblast with no evacuation orders in place. For context, there are 8 cities still under full Ukrainian control in Donetsk Oblast, along with another 4 contested ones (Myrnohrad, Lyman, Rodynske & Kostyantynivka).
The yellow line represents the previous evacuation zone limit, and the pink line represents the new changes.

A "Varshavyanka" submarine has been deployed to the Black Sea from Novorossiysk Naval Base. 
Total possible salvo: 6 Kalibr cruise missiles.
This could be a prelude to a possible large-scale missile attack tomorrow. I will keep you all updated on any changes.

It seems Pro-Ukrainians have once again mass-reported my YouTube channel, resulting in it getting taken down (for the third time). 
"Circumvention policy violation" was the exact same reason I got the last two times it was taken down, and both times it was reinstated. YouTube NEEDS to stop using AI for their moderation.
Military Situation In Ukraine On December 17, 2025 (Maps Update)
Military Situation In Ukraine On December 17, 2025 (Maps Update)

Ukraine Can‚Äôt Stop Russian Advance Along Haichur, Or In Huliapole (Videos)
On December 17, the Russian expanded its control in Dnepropetrovsk along the Haichur River by capturing another settlement, all while battling Kiev forces inside the key city of Huliapole to the south in Zaporozhye.
Gerasimovka, located on the left bank of the Haichur, was captured by the Vostok [East] Group of Forces, according to the Russian Ministry of Defense, which said in a statement that the attack on the settlement was led by the 36th Guards Motorised Rifle Brigade of the 29th Army.
In addition to the ongoing operations along the Haichur, the Vostok Group of Forces continue to expand its control in Huliapole.
Read more 
HERE

Russian Army Is Finishing Off Ukrainian Troops In Myrnohrad (Videos)
On December 17, the Russian military expanded its control in the center of the city of Myrnohrad, also known as Dimitrov, in Donetsk, breaking down most of the last defensive lines of Ukrainian troops besieged there.
The Tsentr [Center] Group of Forces is now reportedly working to clear the center of Myrnohrad. Remaining Ukrainian troops there are no longer fighting as organized formations, but rather in isolated pockets that are being eliminated one after another by Russian troops.
Organized defenses still exist in the northern part of the city, but will not likely hold up for long. The Tsentr Group of Forces is said to be advancing in the Brianka district there.
Read more 
HERE

UKRAINE'S DOUBLE BIND: STALEMATE IN KUPYANSK AMID ORGANIZATIONAL COLLAPSE IN MIRNOGRAD

Battle Of The Haichur: Russian Army Advances Near Stepnohirsk, Fights Ukrainian Forces In Huliaipole
In the Zaporizhzhia sector, Russian forces drove Ukrainian troops out of Herasymivka. In the Kharkiv sector, the Russian army is advancing towards Prylypka and Hrafsky while simultaneously advancing in Vovchanski Khutora. In the Pokrovsk sector, Myrnohrad is being cleared while Ukrainian reserves are transferred to Serhiivka and Hrishyne. 
The United States is privately urging Europe not to use these funds, threatening to demand their return.
Read more 
HERE
